attributes.action: stay strong in the face of media attacks on you and your work!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I want all reasonable citizens to look at the media in all of it's forms to see for themselves the disgraceful lies and miss-quotes / half stories, and miss reporting / selective reporting, on the facts pertaining to to the personal abilities and the fantastic work that has been done by Mr Gordon Brown. 

I have worked within the media, and I know that you can make a clown a genius and a genius a clown. 

I hope that Mr Brown takes the attacks on his personal attributes and his work as a tribute to how the opposition are struggling to match his wisdom!

I have never seen so much activity aimed at undermining Mr Brown - it is a DIRECT RESPONSE TO THE OPPOSITIONS LACK OF SUBSTANCE - BOTH IN LEADERSHIP AND POLICIES.

Please sign this petition to give your support to Mr Brown personally - as he is enduring these attacks on our behalf - and for the good of the country.

PLEASE STAY STRONG MR BROWN - FOR US!

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
